position_sizing.description: Risk 20% of equity per trade, max 5 positions (100% total exposure)

thresholds.description: Dynamic rolling thresholds: top 15% for longs, bottom 15% for shorts (more selective than aggressive models)

conviction_sizing.description: Size positions based on percentile rank - only trade top predictions

stops.description: 3.5× ATR stop loss (between conservative 3× and aggressive 4×), exit after 10 days

profit_targets.description: Take profit at 2.0R - lock in wins while allowing growth

exit_order.description: ATR stop → Profit target → Time stop

ml_model.description: Gradient boosting regression predicting 10-day forward returns

expected_performance.description: Estimated based on interpolation between conservative and balanced models

risk_characteristics.description: Balanced approach for growth-oriented traders with reasonable risk tolerance

design_rationale.purpose: Fill the gap between ultra-conservative (10% R) and high-risk (40% R) models
design_rationale.target_traders: Those seeking solid growth (30-35% annual) with moderate drawdowns (<-10%)
key_differences: 2× position size vs conservative (20% vs 10% R)
50% position size vs balanced (20% vs 40% R)
Tighter profit target (2.0R vs 2.5R) for more frequent wins
Slightly tighter stops (3.5× ATR vs 4×) for better risk control
